Text: Bangkok Corrections Museum:  It was planned to follow the Brixton Prison of England.

Text: Bangkok Corrections Museum:  The prison museum was established in 1939 in another prison, the Bang Kwang Central Prison, which had served as a training center for corrections officers and gained the notorious title "Bangkok Hilton" in the way that the Hanoi Hilton did in Vietnam for its brutal prison history.
Triplets:<Bangkok Corrections Museum
